name: nbusgrvtx
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), crab(s0, c2, wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ USGraph ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→(c0[NeighbVtx]c1)= { s0 ∈ c2 | { c1, s0 } ∈ c3 })

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, cusgr), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, cnbgr, c1), crab(s0, c2, wcel(cpr(c1, cv(s0)), c3))), wcel(c0, cumgr))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈ USGraph, c1 ∈ c2, (c0[NeighbVtx]c1)= { s0 ∈ c2 | { c1, s0 } ∈ c3 }, c0 ∈ UMGraph)
